questions.questionText: Find ID,Name,GPA of students whose GPA is less than 3.6.
Find all the student Names who are applied for ‘Stanford’ and major is ‘CS’
Find all pairs of students whose GPA is same(explained in video)
Find all the Names, GPA of students in ascending order of Names
Find all the sID’s who are applied for ‘psychology’ and ‘history’ using intersect operator.
Find all the sID’s who are applied for ‘psychology’ but not ‘history’ using except operator.
Find all students who applied for ‘CS’ in ‘Stanford’
Find Name, GPA of all the students who are applied for ‘MIT’
